sentences.en: A group of apprentics were operating the hydraulic press.
sentences.cn: 一群学徒正在开动水压机.

sentences.en: Both hydraulic presses and hammers are widely used to produce this class of forgings.
sentences.cn: 水压机和锻锤已广泛用于生产这类锻件.

sentences.en: Dehydration in hydraulic presses is the most general method now in use.
sentences.cn: 在水压机中驱水是目前通用的方法.

sentences.en: Hydraulic jacks under the machine produce the movement.
sentences.cn: 是机器下面的液压千斤顶造成的移动.

sentences.en: Loading was achieved through a battery of hydraulic jacks acting on a rigid metallic distribution plate.
sentences.cn: 通过作用于刚性金属垫板上的一组液压千斤顶加载.

sentences.en: Pascal's law is illustrated by the operation of a hydraulic press, shown in Fig 12 - 3 .
sentences.cn: 如图 12-3 帕斯卡定律可用液压机的作用来说明.

sentences.en: People came in flocks to see the new hydraulic power station beside the dam.
sentences.cn: 人们成群结队地来参观水坝旁边新建的水电站.

sentences.en: Servos for large radars and launchers are either electro - hydraulic or all - electric.
sentences.cn: 大型雷达和发射装置的伺服系统,不是电动 - 液压式的,就是全电动式的.

sentences.en: The boat has no fewer than five hydraulic pumps.
sentences.cn: 这艘船配有不少于5个液压泵。

sentences.en: The dimensions of the difficulty for the hydraulic project have only recently been recognized.
sentences.cn: 这一项水利工程困难的程度只是到最近才被人们所认识.

sentences.en: The front end is equipped with hydraulic jacks used for grade adjustment.
sentences.cn: 前瑞安装有液压千斤顶用来调整坡度.

sentences.en: The maximum density is governed by the allowable limit of fluidity for hydraulic transport.
sentences.cn: 最大密度是由水力输送所容许的流态极限控制的.

sentences.en: The power which moves the parts of the machine comes from hydraulic motors.
sentences.cn: 机器各部份的运动动力来自液压马达.

sentences.en: The test tube is closed at one end with a hydraulic seal.
sentences.cn: 试管的一端为水封所封闭.

sentences.en: This type of barrier is a combination of the pumping trough and the hydraulic ridge.
sentences.cn: 这类屏障是把抽水槽和水力分水岭结合在一起.

words.tran_cn: [机]液压的；[建][流][水利]水力的；水力学的

phrases.tran_cn: 液压控制；水力操纵；液压式控制
水利工程；液压工程；水力工程学
油压机；液压机；水力机械
液压系统；水压系统；电动液压系统；水力循环系统

trans.tran_cn: 水力的，水压的，用水发动的，[建]水硬的，水力学的
trans.tran_en: moved or operated by the pressure of water or other liquid
